titleStmt.title: The word of God to all the elect number with a few words in a deep lamentation over the seed of life, to its tender father concerning them that have transgressed in Israel.
titleStmt.author: West, Thomas, of Hertford.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Thomas West. Hartford the 17th day of the second month. 1664.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
